ComicInfo.Title: The Deathsnake - Part One; Cottonmouth; The Stone Man; The Vampire Delila
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-03 22:36:52. [CVDB160292] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:51:22. [Issue ID 351872]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cecil Pervis Beasley (Palmettoville Chief of Police),Harry "Lance" Larue
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Deathsnake - Part One: Harry arrives in town, and has a drink and talks with Chief Beasley.
Cottonmouth: Working in the swamp as part of the chain gang, Coley is approached by Delila, who has the hots for him. Ed tries to kill Coley by throwing a deadly snake at him, but Coley just warns him not to try it ever again. Back in his cell, Coley shows Valdosta & Ashley his power, and he & Valdosta become lovers.
The Stone Man: Drawn to Coley, Warden Brady becomes his latest lover, and warns him he "must" turn Coley over to his sadistic daughter.
The Vampire Delila: Coley, now in Delila's hands, tells her he's not afraid. Telling him her intentions, she ties him up, but he just taunts her.
